official_title: To amend the National Labor Relations Act to require the arbitration of initial contract negotiation disputes, and for other purposes.
short_title: Labor Relations First Contract Negotiations Act of 2011

summary.text: Labor Relations First Contract Negotiations Act of 2011 - Amends the National Labor Relations Act to require mediation and, if necessary, binding arbitration of initial contract negotiation disputes.

titles.title: Labor Relations First Contract Negotiations Act of 2011
To amend the National Labor Relations Act to require the arbitration of initial contract negotiation disputes, and for other purposes.
